boundary

Class UIMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • boundary.UIMain

  • public class UIMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the entire system. It handles the initial user interface, the user interface for the customer and loads & flushes all the data from and to the .txt files.
    Author:
    SuyashL
